titleStmt.title: An epitomie of mans misery and deliuerie In a sermon preached on the third of the Romans, vers. 23. and 24. By Mr. Paul Bayne.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for Nathaniel Newbery, and are to be sold at the signe of the Starre, vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Starre, vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill
